segments.text: I'm looking for a white purse as a gift . Could you show what you have in stock ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are in luck . We just receive a shipment of several different styles of white purses .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They must be popular again this season .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I believe they are . Here are something that might interest you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow . this is nice . I'll take this one . I guess if she doesn't like it she can return it , right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . Let me ring this up for you at the register . If you would like , this can be gift-wrapped for free . Just take it to the customer service department .
segments.speaker: S2
